text: Cun az ū noumed şudand, ʙaroi maşvarat ʙa kanore raftand va ʙuzurgtarinaşon guft: «Ojo namedoned, ki padaraton az şumo ʙa nomi Alloh pajmon girifta va peş az in niz dar haqqi Jusuf kūtohī kardaed? Man az in sarzamini Misr ʙerun nameojam, to padaram maro içozat dihad jo Alloh dar haqqi man dovarie kunad, ki Ū ʙehtarini dovaron ast
